description:
MSD-LIVE, the MultiSector Dynamics – Living, Intuitive, Value-adding, Environment, is a flexible and scalable data and code
management system combined with a distributed computational platform that will enable MSD researchers to document
and archive their data, run their models and analysis tools, and share their data, software, and multi-model workflows
within a robust Community of Practice. MSD-LIVE will facilitate a new open, collaborative, resource-rich, technology-facilitated,
community-driven way of doing MSD research.
name: msdlive-cli-distro
